title: Ep 113 | Phil's Poaching Days, Si's Early-Morning Drama, and a Miss Kay Update
description:
Phil learns about break dancing and recalls the game-poaching days of his youth. Al shares the story of Si's 6:30 a.m. drama and notices something remarkable about Robertson spouses. Jase identifies the three ways people categorize Jesus. And the guys discuss why there are four gospels, the Lord's Supper and legalism, and how Miss Kay is doing after her recent medical issues.
https://Gabi.com/UNASHAMED
